subject: Replace freeform cell list with cell selector grid pattern
body:
Freeform mode now uses a visual cell selector grid (matching the pattern
used in Media, Style, and Structure tabs) instead of stacking separate
collapsible editors for every cell. Select a cell in the grid, edit its
text below. Cells with content show violet highlight in the grid.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01NFd5wfEQCn6KwD5ZnipfYq
title: Replace freeform cell list with cell selector grid pattern
